query: Black Forest Gravel gravel race Freiburg

videos.title: Freiburg – The Bike City
videos.description: Cycling enthusiasts will find everything they desire in Freiburg. Mountain or valley? E-bike or the classic bio-bike? Here’s the perfect place for anything on two wheels. Enjoy leisurely rides in sunny Freiburg, such as along the Dreisam river, or challenge yourself on the city’s nearby mountain bike trails, or head up to the heights of the Black Forest with a gravel bike. Everything is possible, and there are always fantastic views and plenty of places to stop and refresh along the way.

videos.title: Black Forest  - Lake Titisee
videos.description:
Join us on an exhilarating cycling adventure through the breathtaking landscapes of the Black Forest! 🚴‍♂️🌲 In this video, we explore the Lake Ttisee and beautiful trails, nearby the Feldberg mountain, that make this region a hiker's and cyclist's paradise.

Watch as we navigate through charming villages and take in the serene beauty of nature. Whether you're an experienced cyclist or just a fan of the great outdoors, this journey will inspire you to hit the trails and discover the magic of the Black Forest for yourself.

Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more cycling adventures! Share your favorite cycling spots in the comments below!

Timestamps:
0:00 - Introduction
0:14 - Starting Point: Freiburg im Breisgau
1:49 - Scenic View on Lake Titisee
3:04 - Through the Woods
5:23 - Arriving in Lenzkirch
6:43 - Near the Top of the Tour
7:23 - Downhill the road
8:42 - Back in Freiburg

Follow Us:

    Instagram: sun4weasel

#Cycling #BlackForest #Titisee #Adventure #Nature #Explore

videos.title: Welcome to Black Forest (le paradis du Gravel !) 😍✨
videos.description:
Partir à la recherche des meilleurs spots de vélo européens, afin de vous partager nos tips, des idées de destinations, et vous donner envie de programmer un voyage pour partager un moment inoubliable avec votre bicyclette, c’est le principe de notre série Welcome to ! 🔎🤩

Pour ce premier épisode, on vous amène dans un paradis du gravel à seulement quelques kilomètres de la France : La forêt noire 🌲🪵

En compagnie de notre local rider et fondateur de la chaîne Youtube @SCYENCE_ , Lukas vous présente un ces terrains de jeu favori pour pratiquer le Gravel 😍👌

👉 Si tu es déjà allé rouler sur les sentiers de la forêt noire ? N'hésites pas à partager ta trace à la communauté dans les commentaires ! 🔥

👉 Tu souhaites connaitre ou obtenir les Komoot points de notre voyage ? Laisse nous un commentaire !

__________⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

Pièces de vélo, vélos complets, roues, pneus, textile...  Notre magasin de vélo Probikeshop a tout ce qu'il faut ! 🚴️ Des prix réduits et des livraisons rapides comme l'éclair !

Rendez-vous sur Probikeshop, l'expert en ligne 🚲 depuis 2005 ! 😎👇

🌍 https://www.probikeshop.com/

#AlwaysTheRideTime 🤘

videos.title: Virtual Bike Ride by Gravel Bike | Outskirts to City Center of Freiburg | Bicycle POV ASMR
videos.description:
Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ez2naWZHyrk&list=PL3-ZcV8JXwNR8m35f2lvSuvFKdTlQah1v

--

Location: #freiburg, #blackforest 
#scenicnature #gravelcycling #bikecommute #naturesounds #ambientsounds #urbancycling #BackroadCycling

---

I initially only wanted to capture these moments for myself but figured that recording these gravel rides could be more than just a hidden documentary – IMHO it could have potential to create a window to the world for those who seek to experience unique virtual scenery vor various purposes. Like

- virtual bike training,
- cycling workouts,
- practicing mindfulness,
- or just mental decompression.

Or just want to bring their racing mind to a halt by being a silent, observing passenger for a couple minutes — be my guest.

I Rejoined the biking party in 2022 after 15 years of absence. Due to all the positive effects I imagined the inspiration people could find in my videos as they first engage in nature cycling from the comfort of their homes, feeling the thrill of new landscapes and the tranquility of natural beauty. Maybe even starting sessions on their home trainer. Lastly I believe that you can find a very unique kind of such beauty on everyone's doorstep. You just have to want to see it. I hope these videos encourage you to start your very own endeavour.

For me cycling was not only about physical fitness but also for practicing mindfulness, offering a perfect blend of adventure and peace. Creating a consistent frame of time which allows your mind to wander and recover from mental load spikes you experience during the day. By sharing potentially vibrant experiences, I hope others to discover the beauty and diversity of our world, making every bike training session an exciting and mindful journey.

videos.title: Black Forest Ultra Bike Marathon 2009 @ Alpe de Fidlebrugg
videos.description:
An der Rampe in Aftersteg, die berühmte "Alpe de Fidlebrugg"!
Das ultimative Highlight für Mountainbiker im Schwarzwald!
